data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (availability IS NULL OR availability > 95)) AS 'Health Score' FROM microsoft_azure_storage_blob_service FACET microsoft_azure_storage_blob_service_name
SELECT average(availability) FROM microsoft_azure_storage_blob_service COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Availability (Percent)
presentation.notes: Availability is calculated by taking the TotalBillableRequests value and dividing it by the number of applicable requests, including those that produced unexpected errors. All unexpected errors result in reduced availability for the service.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(transactions) FROM microsoft_azure_storage_blob_service COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Transactions (Transactions)
presentation.notes: The number of requests made to a storage service or the specified API operation. This number includes successful and failed requests, as well as requests which produced errors

data.nrql: SELECT sum(blob_capacity) FROM microsoft_azure_storage_blob_service COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Blob Capacity (Bytes)
presentation.notes: The amount of storage used by the storage account?s Blob service.

data.nrql: SELECT average(ingress) FROM microsoft_azure_storage_blob_service COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Ingress (Bytes)
presentation.notes: The amount of ingress data. This number includes ingress from an external client into Azure Storage as well as ingress within Azure.

data.nrql: SELECT average(egress) FROM microsoft_azure_storage_blob_service COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Egress (Bytes)
presentation.notes: The amount of egress data. This number includes egress from an external client into Azure Storage as well as egress within Azure. As a result, this number does not reflect billable egress.

data.nrql: SELECT average(success_e2e_latency) FROM microsoft_azure_storage_blob_service COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Success E2E Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: The average end-to-end latency of successful requests made to this service. This value includes the required processing time within Azure Storage to read the request, send the response, and receive acknowledgment of the response.

data.nrql: SELECT average(success_server_latency) FROM microsoft_azure_storage_blob_service COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Success Server Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: The average latency used by Azure Storage to process a successful request. This value does not include the network latency specified in AverageE2ELatency.
